DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to evaluate safety, tolerability, PK and PD effects of orally administered AZD8529 after single ascending doses
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female subjects aged 18 to 45 years (inclusive) on Day 1. Female subjects must be of nonchild bearing potential. Has received another new chemical entity (defined as a compound which has not been approved for marketing) or has participated in any other clinical study that included drug treatment within 3 months of the first administration of investigational prod Plasma donation within one month of screening or any blood donation/blood loss > 500mL during the 3 months prior to screening Clinically relevant abnormalities in physical examinations, vital signs, ECG, clinical chemistry, hematology or urinalysis
